title: Educational outreach, public policy changes needed to reduce health hazards at nail salons

title_detail.value: Educational outreach, public policy changes needed to reduce health hazards at nail salons

summary: The nail salon industry has seen rapid growth within the last 20 years, becoming increasingly popular among women of all ages. For the technicians in those salons, this beauty can come with a cost: an exposure to potentially unsafe chemicals and other health hazards. A study has found that educational outreach and change in public policy are needed to help reduce these hazards for salon employees and owners.
